Deception {2}{R} [i]({2}{R}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)[/i]
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, create a Weapon token. [i](It’s an Equipment with equip {2} and “Equipped creature gets +1/+1.”)[/i]
